description:
Amikumo Tsuyoshi enjoys chatting with people he doesn’t know online, but ends up in an argument with one of the random people. He eventually ends up kicked out of the chatroom. He then receives something from Moguro and attempts to get revenge, but... Chikako wants to go on a vacation somewhere someday, but her stingy nature has prevented her from doing so. She then meets Moguro, who tells her about a ridiculously cheap vacation package, and she just can’t say no. However, there was a catch that no one would’ve expected...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chat Room no Ou-sama / Nippon Kaigairyokou
König des Chatrooms / Ausflug nach Übersee in Japan
Le roi du chat – Voyage à l’étranger
The King of the Chat Room / Japan Overseas Trip
チャットルームの王様 / ニッポン海外旅行
